SaferInternetDay2019.title: Safer Internet Day 2019 was on 5th Feb 2019!
SaferInternetDay2019.content: It is a day to promote the safer and more responsible use of online technology and mobile devices, especially among children and young people. Together for a better internet. Bear in mind that online life is real life!

SmartNetizenCompetition.title: 「國際互聯網安全日」定於今年的2月5日
SmartNetizenCompetition.content: 讓大眾關注如何更安全及更負責任地使用網上技術和流動電子產品，尤其是兒童及年青人。一同攜手共建更安全的網絡世界，謹記網絡世界都是真實世界！
